Actions.Name: Spray
Actions.Effect: Attack target explodes shoving adjacent characters 1 away from them and dealing [fray] piercing damage to them.

Actions.Name: Volatile Mix
Actions.Description: The Alchemist chooses a foe in range 6. At the end of that foe's next turn, they explode, taking 2 piercing damage and dealing 2 piercing damage to all other characters in range 2.

Actions.Name: Sticky Solution
Actions.Description: Area becomes difficult terrain for the rest of combat.
